title: The desert blooms
caption: The desert blooms
desc: Spring may yet to have sprung here in the UK, but across the Atlantic, in the US state of Arizona, the Sonoran Desert is coming into wildflower season. Soon the big daddy of the cactus world – the saguaro – will start to bloom. This amazing succulent is the largest cactus in the United States (it can grow higher than 50ft and weigh several tonnes, when it’s fully hydrated).
copyright: Saguaro cactus flowers, Coronado National Forest, Arizona, USA (© Jack Dykinga/Minden Pictures)
